sbt
===

# Available modules


The overview below shows which sbt installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using sbt, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load sbt/1.3.13-Java-1.8
```
